About Me

Web Developer | Creative Technologist

Hi, I'm Pender Daniel, a self-taught frontend developer from Nigeria. I love turning ideas into interactive, clean, and modern layouts. I'm currently focused on building beautiful UIs and helping small businesses go digital.

I specialize in crafting responsive websites, tech-based tools, and interactive UIs that not only catch eyes but also elevate functionality. Whether I’m working on a personal project or collaborating with a team, my goal is to deliver results that impress and inspire

Vision

To lead a new generation of developers and innovators by creating tech that’s not only powerful but personal — shaping the future of web, gaming, AI, and robotics through purposeful design and boundary-breaking creativity.

Mission

To design and build sleek, high-performing digital experiences that are bold, intuitive, and future-ready — empowering brands, creators, and gamers to stand out online through code, creativity, and innovation.

FurniT

FurniT is a sleek front-end work for a furniture site. The template is available for purchasing if interested.

RentalX is a sleek front-end work for automobile showcasing and vendoring purposes. The template is available for purchasing if interested.

Automod is a sleek front-end work for automobile showcasing and vendoring purposes also. The template is available for purchasing if interested.

HIGHFLYERS

HIGHFLYERS is an educational institution website. Template available for purchase.

Cryoluxe

Cryoluxe or Ice world is a sleek and frosty front-end work for ice cream varieties and vendoring purposes. The template is available for purchasing if interested.
